transactions viewing in journals Journals
section.para: To view Journal transactions on systems configured to post transactions to intermediate Journals, select the "Journals" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Journal transactions, you are presented with the following options:

note.para: The system-defined default filter on the Journals screen shows all transactions for the current day.

Among its many features, the Journals query builder includes an option for showing Accounts with a Project Number as the last segment. If the "Show Project Detail" option is not used, balances will roll up into the parent Account total.

listitem.para: Display lists Journals based on the specified parameters.

tip.para: If your transaction records are displaying a "No" value in the "Posted" column, this means the transactions have not yet been posted to the General Ledger. Until they are posted to the General Ledger, Journal transactions will not appear in the Trial Balance or other financial reports.
